sentences.en: " Is the brat baptized? " he questioned.
sentences.cn: " 那娃娃给施了洗礼了? " 他问.

sentences.en: " Who said it wasn't , brat? " Madam sounded angry.
sentences.cn: 大娘很生气的说: “ 毛丫头,谁说值得?
一个被宠坏的顽劣儿童

sentences.en: But an only child isn't necessarily a loner, misfit and brat.
sentences.cn: 但独生子女并不必然就会孤独, 不合群并且淘气.

sentences.en: He's a spoilt brat and it's about time he learnt to behave properly.
sentences.cn: 他是个被宠坏的孩子，是该学些规矩了。

sentences.en: James: You snotty little brat! Open up!
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯: 你这个小屁孩! 开门!

sentences.en: Jim Moore was an army brat who had grown up all over.
sentences.cn: 吉姆.摩尔是个军队之子,到处都生活过.

sentences.en: That brat was known to devil all of his classmates.
sentences.cn: 那个淘气孩子让所有同学都很头疼.

sentences.en: The brat cast the rowboat loose again! Let's get it.
sentences.cn: 这小家伙又解开缆绳把划艇放了! 咱们把它弄回来.

sentences.en: The brat sicked his dog on the passer - by .
sentences.cn: 那个顽童纵狗去咬 过路人.

sentences.en: You just look like a brat who play surfing all day long.
sentences.cn: 你看起来就像个整天冲浪的死小孩嘛!
你这个没良心的小坏蛋。

sentences.en: You would give up your sacred rights for this brat you barely know?
sentences.cn: 你要放弃你神圣的权力 吗 ?就为了这个你甚至不认识的小家伙?

trans.tran_cn: 小孩，尤指被宠坏的或举止粗鲁的小孩，美国大兵
